titleInfo.title: Printed correspondence gathered under the heading ‘Correspondence on Cotton Cultivation’

mods.abstract: The printed correspondence is a collection of seven letters or reports on cotton cultivation, written by representatives of Government, including G F Forbes, Superintendent of the Cotton Gin Factory. The correspondence includes: a report on the cultivation of seed cotton at Dharwar; methods and approaches to cultivation to improve yields; report of four acres’ worth of experimental planting at Hooblee; reports on the failure of early planting; results and accounts of the experimental planting at Dharwar; results of a third experiment at Bunkapoor.
